creditline: Museum purchase, Fowler McCormick, Class of 1921, Fund
markings: Foundry mark in relief on reverse: Eck et Durand; incised: 292
inscribed:
Left, each line centered beneath the one above:  AGAMEMNON / OPHIS / CLOVIS / FRÉDÉGONDE / CHARLEMAGNE / LOUIS-IX / CHARLES-VI / - / PINTO / - /     PLAUTE / CHRISTOPHE / COLOMBE / - / RICHELIEU / OU / LA JOURNÉE /  DES DUPES



Right, each line centered beneath the one above: MOYSE / - / HOMERE / ET / ALEXANDRE / - / L'ATLANTIDE / - / LA / PANHYPOCRISIADE



Bottom: NEPOMUCENE L. LEMERCIER 

Signed and dated upon neck: P.J. DAVID. 1832
